comments.author: kamil
comments.content: I think Ryan showed me that on youtube once. It was very interesting indeed. I liked how they could remove a person by putting negative weighting. Are we talking about the same thing?

comments.author: rheide
comments.content: Yup ,it's the same thing. I'm thinking I should remove a random person for all my travel pics before I share them just to see how they react when they find out :D
